participant_1.background:
I like to exercise.
I like to listen to music.
My father lives in china.
I have a boxer dog.

participant_2.background:
I cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat.
I believe in aliens.
I hate cleaning up after my husband and children.

content.text: It's nice to meet you, [name]. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to exercise, listen to music, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to exercise too, but I don't like listening to music. I prefer to listen to the sounds of nature.
That's interesting! I love nature, but I find it hard to focus on my exercise when I'm listening to the sounds of the forest.
I can understand that. I guess it just depends on what you're in the mood for.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read, go for walks, and play with my dog.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Jane Austen, but I also love historical fiction and mysteries.
I've never read any Jane Austen, but I've heard good things. I'm more of a fantasy and science fiction reader myself.
I love fantasy and sci-fi too! I'm currently reading Dune.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book too. I'm not sure if I'm ready to read it yet, but I'm definitely adding it to my list.
You should! It's a really good book.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad we got to talk, Sarah. It was really nice to meet you.
You too, [name]. It was nice talking to you too.
